page.title: 0825 Years Of Winnall School.
page.content: Winnall County Primary School,in Garbett Road,Winchester,was officially opened on Friday 1st October 1960.The school was built within the contract period of 1 year.It was started in 1959.There were 180 children when it first opened.The school is for 5 to 11 year olds.It had 7 classrooms. Now we have only 5 which are equipped with sinks and have toilets and cloakrooms outside .There are now only 120 children on the role .The construction materials are mostly wood,laminated beams and Douglas Fir posts with Red Cedar wood cladding. The ceiling is fireproof asbestos boards treated with acoustic absorbent.There are large play areas of grass and tarmac which, with the school building, cover 3 acres.We now have a Music/Drama Room, Resources Room and a library.We have built a pond and planted a wild area.
